Smart Home Security in Your Pocket

Visory transforms your smartphone into a powerful CCTV camera for home protection or pet care. Monitor what matters most, from anywhere.

Why Choose Visory?

A wide range of applications for your home security and pet monitoring needs

Pet Monitoring

Keep an eye on your pets when you're away. Get alerts when they bark or make noise.

Child Safety

Perfect for using as a WiFi kids monitor. Get alerts when your child cries.

Home Security

Know what is going on in your home when you're not there. Get alerts for any suspicious activity.

Smart Alerts

The intruder will not slip unnoticed with our advanced motion and sound detection.

Coming Soon

Rich features for incredible home protection and pet care

Night Video Camera

Arrange overnight surveillance sessions. Keep your eye on what is going on in the darkroom.

Sound & Motion Detection

Nothing will be left unnoticed. Get an instant alert as the system detects any sound or motion.

Kids Cry & Bark Detection

The app detects kids cry and barking and sends you an instant alert. Perfect for pet monitoring or nanny cam.

Human Detection

The app distinguishes humans from other objects. Get alerts only when a person is detected.

All recordings are auto-saved to the cloud for easy access and review.
